name: Learnjquery
body:
# LearnJquary How to learn Jquary ala Juandisay
EvENT HANDLER:
a. .click()
b. .change()

c. .focusin()
d. .focus()
e. .focusout()

f. .hover()
g. .mouseenter()
h. .mouseout()

i. .toggle()
j. .keyup()
k. .keydown()
l. .keypress()
m. .scroll()
ANIMATION JQUARY .Animate()
.fadeIn()
.fadeOut()
.fadeTo()
.slideDown()
.slideUp()
CONTEN MANIPULATION a.- HTML()
b.- append ()
c.- prepend()
d.- parent()
e.- text()
f.- attr()
g.- each()
h.- prop()
i.- removeattr()
j.- val()
k.- css()
l.- is()
Special thanks to my farents;
good bless my friends...fighting 'SUSU NAGA'
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
